column5: Our Entrepreneurship, Finance and Innovation MSc programme analyses the entrepreneur, the innovation process and the role of financial support when creating, growing and sustaining start-up companies and organisations.By studying our master's in Entrepreneurship, Finance and Innovation, you will have the opportunity to explore and reflect on the skills needed for success and the role of old and new financing models in business.
column7: For more information, please visit the programme page on our website.
